original_text: He revealeth the deep and secret things: he knoweth what is in the darkness, and the light dwelleth with him.
korean_text: 그는 깊고 은밀한 일을 나타내시고 어두운 데에 있는 것을 아시며 또 빛이 그와 함께 있도다

sentences.original_text: He revealeth the deep and secret things
he knoweth what is in the darkness
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 어둠 속에 있는 것을 아신다

sentences.original_text: and the light dwelleth with him
